synopsis.text: Shimarisu the chipmunk, Araiguma the raccoon, and Bonobono the kind-hearted sea otter are the best of friends living near a sprawling forest. Each day brings new, small adventures for this lovable trio, with Shimarisu's mischievous antics and Araiguma's short temper keeping life interesting for the good-natured Bonobono. Adapted from Igarashi Mikio's delightful four-panel gag manga, this anime follows the daily escapades of these endearing animal pals.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
